docs.snippet: THE creation of an American zone of sanity in a mad world -- that is the sizable task confronting the Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace, which opens next Tuesday at Buenos Aires. The prestige and promise of the meeting are...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE creation of an American zone of sanity in a mad world -- that is the sizable task confronting the Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace, which opens next Tuesday at Buenos Aires. The prestige and promise of the meeting are enhanced by the presence of President Roosevelt: the conference was called at his suggestion, and with the cordial accord of the twenty Latin-American Presidents.
docs.abstract: Prophecy of unity of North and South Amer recalled in feature article by H Herring; illus of statue in Lima, Peru

headline.main: ZONE OF SANITY IN A MAD WORLD'; Nations of the Americas Hope to Set Example Insulation Against War in Europe Is Their Aim SEEKING A 'ZONE OF SANITY IN A MAD WORLD' The Nations of the Western Hemisphere, Meeting at Buenos Aires To Promote Peace, Hope to Set an Example for Uneasy Europe

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Nov. 29. -- President Roosevelt approached the shores of Argentina tonight under an escort of picked units of the Argentine Navy with prospects for the most impressive reception of his career. No effort has been spared here...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Nov. 29. -- President Roosevelt approached the shores of Argentina tonight under an escort of picked units of the Argentine Navy with prospects for the most impressive reception of his career. No effort has been spared here to arrange what is apparently a sincere tribute by the entire Argentine people to the man who stands in their eyes as the champion of fair play in the Western Hemisphere.
docs.abstract: Roosevelt nears Buenos Aires; saluted by Argentine fleet; radio exchange of messages with Pres Justo

headline.main: BUENOS AIRES HALLS ROOSEVELT TODAY IN GREAT PAGEANT; Excitement Runs High in Gayly Decked City as President Nears Argentine Shores. WARSHIPS ESCORTING HIM Triumphal Parade Through 4 Miles of Capital Expected to Eclipse All Previous Fetes. BUENOS AIRES HAILS ROOSEVELT TODAY

docs.snippet: So far as business and fluctuations in the foreign exchanges went, last week's market dovetailed closely with that of preceding sessions -- a light demand for bills, coupled with a limited range in values.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 30. -- The Pan-American Peace Conference, which President Franklin D. Roosevelt suggested last January, will open here tomorrow afternoon under the official name of the Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 30. -- The Pan-American Peace Conference, which President Franklin D. Roosevelt suggested last January, will open here tomorrow afternoon under the official name of the Inter-American Conference for the Maintenance of Peace.

docs.snippet: GENEVA, Dec. 1. -- The League of Nations Secretariat announced today that the League Council would meet here Dec. 10 in response to the Spanish Government's appeal that it examine the danger to peace caused by the German and Italian "armed...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Dec. 1. -- The League of Nations Secretariat announced today that the League Council would meet here Dec. 10 in response to the Spanish Government's appeal that it examine the danger to peace caused by the German and Italian "armed intervention" and recognition of General Francisco Franco, Rebel chief.
docs.abstract: session called for Dec 10; Journal des Nations to demand Chile resign presidency on grounds of prejudice against Spanish Govt and partiality for Italy

headline.main: LEAGUE'S COUNCIL WILL ACT ON SPAIN; Members Are Summoned for Meeting Dec. 10 in Response to Government's Plea. CHILE'S STATUS ATTACKED President of Geneva Body Is Held to Be Prejudiced in Favor of Italy.
